short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trending News provides easy access to the latest news and headlines via a widget on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of the latest news with the Trending News extension. Access a wide range of trending stories and in-depth articles from reliable news sources, right from your browser. 

This news extension gives you instant access to the latest articles from the world of business, entertainment, politics, sports, science & technology, and more. 

How to use the news widget:
-Click the puzzle icon on the toolbar, then click on Trending News to access the widget
-Click a preview image on the news widget to read an article
-Select a category to get industry-specific articles

Permissions:
Read and modify your data on trendingnews.com: This permission is required to make calls to our API via our domain to provide you with the communicated functionality.

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
https://trendingnews.com/public/contactus_cc.html

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here:
https://trendingnews.com/public/uninstall_cc.html
